page.title: 05PARISH COUNCIL OFFICE.
page.content: Another important building is the Parish Council Office which has been here since 1966.The Wesley School was converted for its use.The area of 35000 acres covered by the Civil Parish of Bradfield includes Low & High Bradfield,Midhop,Stannington, Loxley,Worrall,Oughtibridge,Wharncliff e Side & Ewden Village & is the largest civil parish in the country.The population is 14,469.The work undertaken by the Council includes care of cemetaries,footpaths & playing_fields,nature trails,tree lopping,dealing with complaints & providing 11 Christmas trees in main centres.They operate on a budget(1985 _1986)of Â£54,200.00.There are thirteen Councillors.One of their main concerns is to retain the essentially rural character of the area.
